snippet: Scientists have developed a fuller picture of how the virus spread and evolved by tracking mutations in its genome.
abstract: Researchers have created fuller picture of how Ebola virus spread and evolved during 2014 outbreak by sequencing genomes of viruses from over 400 patients in Sierra Leone, Guinea and Liberia.
lead_paragraph: Scientists have developed a fuller picture of how the virus spread and evolved by tracking mutations in its genome.

headline.main: Genome Studies Show How Ebola Spread Initially
headline.print_headline: Genome Studies Show How Ebola Spread Initially
